entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers later this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023
